account_pending_admin: This account is pending approval. An administrator must activate it before you can continue.
admin_dashboard_summary: Monitor release status, backups, and usage metrics.
admin_login_intro: Manage system settings, users, and reviews from the dedicated admin area.
admin_only_access: Administrator access is required to use this page.
admin_sign_in_subheading: Use your administrator credentials to access the dashboard.
all_periods_used: ለዚህ ጥያቄ ያሉ ጊዜዎች ሁሉ አስቀድሞ ተጠቅመዋል
analytics_download_questionnaire_hint: Detailed breakdown for this questionnaire, including top contributors.
analytics_download_reports_hint: Quickly download PDF snapshots for offline sharing.
analytics_download_summary_details_hint: Adds the leading contributors for the busiest questionnaire.
analytics_download_summary_hint: Includes total responses, averages, and questionnaire performance.
analytics_looker_resources_hint: Share the PDF guide and copy the SQL query into Google Looker Studio to build custom dashboards.
analytics_report_download_failed: የትንታኔ ሪፖርቱን ማዘጋጀት አልተቻለም። እባክዎ እንደገና ይሞክሩ።
analytics_report_recipients_required: Please provide at least one valid email address.
analytics_report_send_failed: Unable to send the analytics report email.
analytics_schedule_create_failed: Unable to save the schedule. Please try again.
analytics_schedule_start_invalid: Please provide a valid start date and time.
api_doc_reference_hint: መመሪያ ትፈልጋለህ? የመግለጫ ክፍሉ አሁን ማረጋገጫውን፣ የምላሽ ቅርጾችን እና የቅድሚያ ስርአቶችን ያጉልማል።
api_doc_step_authorize: የክፍለ ጊዜ ኩኪዎን ለማካተት Authorize ቁልፉን ይጠቀሙ ወይም የcurl ምሳሌዎችን ለሙከራ ይቅዱ።
api_doc_step_open: ይህን ገፅ ክፈቱ እና በቀጥታ የOpenAPI መግለጫውን ይመልከቱ።
api_doc_step_sign_in: API ጥሪ ከመጀመርዎ በፊት እንደ አስተዳዳሪ ይግቡ እና ክፍለ ጊዜዎን ያቋቋሙ።
api_doc_step_try_it: አንድ ስራ ይምረጡ፣ ይዘረጉት እና Try it out ብለው በአሁኑ ገጽታ የተስተካከለ ጥያቄ ያቀርቡ።
api_doc_viewer_failed: ተንቀሳቃሽ ተመልካቹን መጫን አልተቻለም። ከዚህ በታች ያለውን OpenAPI JSON መውረድ ትችላለህ።
api_documentation_intro: በመድረኩ ላይ ያሉትን REST እና FHIR መገናኛዎች ይመልከቱ። የተጠበቁ ነጥቦችን ለመጠቀም ማረጋገጫ ያስፈልጋል።
assignment_defaults_hint: እነዚህ ጥያቄዎች በሰራተኛው የስራ ተግባር መሠረት በራሱ ላይ ይጨመራሉ። ከዚህ ገጽ ላይ ማስወገዳቸው አይቻልም።
assignment_defaults_none: ለዚህ ስራ ተግባር እስካሁን የተመደቡ ጥያቄዎች የሉም።
assignment_instructions: ይህ ሰራተኛ እንዲያገኙአቸው የሚፈልጉትን ጥያቄ ሰነዶች ይምረጡ።
assignment_manage_from_defaults: Update the work function defaults to change which questionnaires appear here.
assignment_multiselect_hint: ከአንዱ በላይ ንጥሎችን ለመምረጥ Ctrl (Windows) ወይም Command (macOS) ይጫኑ።
assignment_no_defaults_for_function: No questionnaires are assigned to this work function yet.
assignment_staff_only: ጥያቄዎች ለሰራተኛ መለያየት ብቻ ይተገበራሉ። እነዚህ ምርጫዎች ሚናው ሰራተኛ ሲሆን ብቻ ይቀናሉ።
assignment_work_function_only: Questionnaires are now managed at the work function level. To change which questionnaires are available to staff, update the defaults on the Work Function Defaults page.
assignment_work_function_override: To override the default questionnaires for an individual, update their work function in the user profile.
assignments_save_failed: ምደባዎችን ማዘመን አልተቻለም። እባክዎን ዳግም ይሞክሩ።
auto_approve_failed: Settings saved, but pending submissions could not be finalized automatically.
backup_directory_failed: Unable to prepare the backup directory.
backup_extension_missing: The ZipArchive extension is required to generate backups.
backup_failed: Unable to generate the backup archive.
backup_hint: Keep regular snapshots before installing updates.
backup_required_before_upgrade: Download a fresh backup before installing the upgrade.
brand_color_hint: ቁልፎችን፣ ማብራቶችን እና ግራዲየንቶችን ለማስተካከል የምትፈልጉትን የገጽታ ቀለም ይምረጡ።
branding_save_failed: የምልክት ለውጦችን ማስቀመጥ አልተቻለም። እባክዎ እንደገና ይሞክሩ።
branding_summary: Customize logos, colors, and the landing page.
col_account_status: Account status when the export was generated
col_created_at: Date and time the response was saved
col_period: Performance period label linked to the response
col_response_id: Unique identifier of the questionnaire response
col_reviewed_at: Date and time of the latest review, if any
col_reviewer_full_name: Full name of the reviewer, if available
col_reviewer_username: Username of the reviewer who provided feedback
col_role: User role at the time of submission
confirm_deactivate_prompt: Type the username to confirm deactivation.
cta_body: ግምገማዎችን ያቀላጥፉ፣ ተሳትፎን ያበረታቱ እና በታማኝ መድረክ ግንኙነት ያስተናግዱ።
dashboard_intro: ግምገማ ለማስገባት፣ አፈጻጸምን ለመከታተል ወይም ስርዓቱን ለመቆጣጠር ምናሌውን ይጠቀሙ
deactivate_verification_failed: The entered username did not match. No changes were made.
delete_verification_failed: ያስገቡት የተጠቃሚ ስም አልተዛመደም። ምንም ለውጥ አልተደረገም።
draft_saved: ቅድሚያው ተቀምጧል። በተመሳሳይ የአፈጻጸም ጊዜ ወደዚህ ጥያቄ ተመልሰው ማስተካከል ትችላላችሁ።
duplicate_submission: ለተመረጠው የአፈጻጸም ጊዜ ቅፅ አስቀድሞ ተሞልቷል
email_template_settings_hint: Customize the subject and HTML content for outgoing notification emails. You can use hyperlinks and the placeholders listed for each template.
epss_kpi_title: Percentage of staff reaching 80% or more
export_assessments_intro: Download all recorded assessment responses as a CSV file for offline analysis or archival.
export_data_summary: Download assessment data for reporting or analysis.
export_notice: The export includes reviewer information, status changes, and performance period details for each response.
feature_collaboration_body: ከአስተዳዳሪዎችና ከባለሙያ ባለሞያዎች ጋር ግምገማዎችን በመመሪያዎችና በአስታዋሚዎች ያቀናብሩ።
feature_growth_body: ቡድኖችዎን በተዘጋጀ የመማር ጎዳና፣ የእድገት ግብዣዎች እና በጊዜው ምስጋና ይደግፉ።
feature_insights_body: ለእርስዎ ተስማሚ የተሰሩ ዳሽቦርዶችን በመጠቀም እድገቱን በፍጥነት ይገነዘቡ።
features_subheading: የፖርታሉ ክፍሎች ሁሉ የሰራተኞችን እድገት እና የድርጅት አፈጻጸም ለማጎልበት ተዘጋጅተዋል።
fhir_import_failed: FHIR import failed. Please check your file and try again.
footer_note: My Performance — በማቴሪያል ተነሳሽ የተገነባ እቃ. አስተዳዳሪው ሎጎ፣ የጣቢያ ስም፣ መግቢያ ጽሑፍ፣ አድራሻ እና እውቂያን ሊያሻሽል ይችላል።
force_password_reset_notice: For security, you must set a new password before continuing.
help_analytics_tip_filters: ስለሚናገሩት ፕሮግራሞች ለመተኮር በጥያቄ ስም ማጣሪያዎችን ይጠቀሙ።
help_analytics_tip_reports: የተመዘገበ ኢሜል ሪፖርት ለማስተናገድ መርሃግብሩን ይጠቀሙ።
help_analytics_tip_scores: የውጤት መደበኛዎችን ለማነጻጸር በካርታው ላይ ያንሱ።
help_assignments_tip_save: ለውጦቹ ከመዝጋት በኋላ ወዲያውኑ ይተገበራሉ፤ ተጨማሪ ማረጋገጫ አያስፈልግም።
help_assignments_tip_search: የጥያቄውን መጀመሪያ ፊደል በመጻፍ ፈጥነው ይፈልጉት።
help_assignments_tip_select: ከአንድ በላይ ጥያቄ በአንድ ጊዜ ለመመደብ የብዙ ምርጫውን ይጠቀሙ።
help_dashboard_tip_backups: ማሻሻያ ወይም ትልቅ አስገባት ከመጀመርዎ በፊት ቅጂ ያውርዱ።
help_dashboard_tip_tasks: እንዲስተካከሉ የማይችሉ ሪፖርቶችን ወይም ማሻሻያዎችን ለማወቅ የስርዓት ስራዎችን ይመልከቱ።
help_default_tip_navigation: መተግበሪያውን የሥራ ቦታ፣ ቡድን እና አስተዳደር ለመቀየር ማውጫውን ይጠቀሙ።
help_default_tip_support: የድጋፍ መረጃን ለማዘመን ወደ ቅንብር ገፅ ይሂዱ።
help_performance_tip_drafts: በኦፍላይን ስትሆኑ ስለማትጥፉ ቅድሚያ የተቀመጡትን መግቢያዎች ይቀጥሉ።
help_performance_tip_scores: በጊዜው ውስጥ ያሉ ውጤቶችን ለማየት የጊዜ መስመር ካርታውን ይጠቀሙ።
help_settings_tip_branding: የመለያ እና ቋንቋ ቅንብሮችን ለድርጅታችሁ ይዛመዱ።
help_settings_tip_notifications: የኢሜል ሪፖርቶችን ከማብራትዎ በፊት SMTP ያዋቁ።
help_settings_tip_reviews: የተቆጣጣሪ ሂደቱን ለመቆም የግምገማ መቀየሪያውን ይጠቀሙ።
insight_hint: Use these trends to target coaching and professional development activities.
install_app_summary: Add this app to your device for quick access.
invalid_date: እባክዎን ትክክለኛ የሚቀጥለውን የግምገማ ቀን ያስገቡ።
invalid_login: የተሳሳተ ተጠቃሚ ስም ወይም የይለፍ ቃል
invalid_phone: Enter a valid phone number including the country code.
invalid_questionnaire_selection: The selected questionnaire is not available.
landing_cta_note: One secure sign-in for managers, reviewers, and employees.
landing_intro: ወደ የአፈጻጸም አስተዳደር ፖርታል እንኳን ደህና መጡ። ስለ ድርጅቶ የግምገማ ፕሮግራም ሀብቶችንና ዜናዎችን ያግኙ።
landing_summary_body: ግብዣ፣ ክትትል እና ስኬቶችን በአንድ መድረክ ለማዋሃድ ይጠቀሙ።
language_required_notice: ቢያንስ እንግሊዘኛ ወይም ፈረንሳይኛ እንዲቀር ይጠበቅ።
language_settings_hint: ለተጠቃሚዎች የሚታዩ የተጠቃሚ ገጽታ ቋንቋዎችን ይምረጡ።
leave_blank_keep_password: Leave blank to keep current password.
leave_blank_to_keep: Leave blank to keep current password
local_login_disabled: Local account sign-in is disabled. Use single sign-on to continue.
local_login_disabled_notice: Local account sign-in is disabled. Use Google single sign-on to continue.
local_login_toggle_hint: Disable this option to require SSO (for example, Google) on the main login page. Administrators can still use the dedicated admin login.
login_highlight_one: Single, secure access for every role.
login_highlight_three: Optimized for fast check-ins on any device.
login_highlight_two: Keep your assessments and feedback in sync.
logo_auto_generated: The system automatically generates a logo based on your brand colors.
logo_upload_error_extension: የ PHP ተወላጅ ማስፋፊያ መጫኑን አገደው።
logo_upload_error_generic: ሎጎውን መጫን አልተሳካም። እባክዎ እንደገና ይሞክሩ።
logo_upload_error_type: ሎጎው የ PNG፣ JPG፣ GIF፣ SVG ወይም WebP ምስል መሆን አለበት።
logo_upload_error_write: የተጫነውን ሎጎ ወደ ዲስክ መጻፍ አልተቻለም።
logo_upload_failed: የሎጎ መጫን አልተሳካም። ሌሎች ለውጦች ተቀምጠዋል።
logo_upload_hint: PNG፣ JPG፣ GIF፣ SVG ወይም WebP ፋይል እስከ 2 MB ያስገቡ።
manage_questionnaires_summary: Build, organize, and publish assessment questionnaires.
manage_users_summary: Invite, edit, or deactivate accounts and roles.
my_performance_pdf_footer: የቅርብ ጊዜ ትንታኔን እና የክፍል ዝርዝሮችን ለማየት ወደ ፖርታሉ ይግቡ።
my_performance_summary: Track your objectives, reviews, and milestones.
my_workspace_summary: Stay on top of your goals and tasks.
name: Name
next_assessment_not_set: Your next assessment date has not been scheduled yet.
no_backups_available: No upgrade backups are available yet.
no_courses_available: ለአሁኑ ውጤቶችዎ ተወላጅ ኮርስ አልተገኘም። ለተስተካከለ የመማር መንገድ እባክዎን ከአስተባባሪዎ ጋር ይነጋገሩ።
no_pending_accounts: No accounts require approval at this time.
no_pending_reviews: በአሁኑ ጊዜ ለግምገማ የሚጠብቁ ማቅረቦች የሉም።
no_questionnaire_stats: No questionnaire responses are available yet.
no_questions_found: No questionnaire items were found for this submission.
no_responses_for_selection: There are no responses for this questionnaire yet.
no_schedules_configured: No report schedules have been configured yet.
no_submissions_yet: No submissions recorded yet. Complete your first assessment to see insights.
no_training_gaps: All recorded submissions achieved full marks. Great job!
no_trend_data: Submit assessments to generate your performance trend.
no_upgrade_activity: No upgrade commands have been executed yet.
no_upgrade_found: No upgrade package is currently available.
no_user_breakdown: No participant data available for this questionnaire.
no_users_found: የተጠቃሚ መለያዎች አልተገኙም። ለመጀመር አዲስ መለያ ይፍጠሩ።
offline_banner_offline: ከመስመር ውጭ ነዎት። ቅርብ የተዘረጋው መረጃ እስከሚገናኙ ድረስ ይገኛል።
offline_banner_online: ወደ መስመር ተመለሱ። የቅርብ ዝማኔዎችን ማመሳሰል በመካሄድ ላይ ነው።
offline_draft_error: We could not save an offline copy of your responses.
offline_draft_queued: You are offline. We saved your responses locally. Reconnect and submit to sync.
offline_draft_reminder: Back online. Submit to upload your saved responses.
offline_login_error: We could not complete offline sign-in. Try again when you have a connection.
offline_login_invalid: Offline sign-in failed. Double-check your username and password.
offline_login_unavailable: Offline login is not available yet. Connect to the internet and sign in once to enable offline access.
password_reset_required: እባክዎን ከመቀጠልዎ በፊት አዲስ የይለፍ ቃል ያዘጋጁ።
password_too_short: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
pending_account_notice: Your account is pending supervisor approval. You can update your profile while you wait.
pending_accounts_summary: Approve or reject incoming access requests.
performance_heatmap_hint: Heatmap colours shift from red to green so low scores stand out for follow-up.
performance_timeline_alt: Line chart showing your performance timeline
phone_number_hint: Choose a country code and enter digits only.
profile_summary: Update your profile details and settings.
qb_builder_intro: Build and organize questionnaires for upcoming assessments.
qb_navigation_hint: Use the section list to jump around large questionnaires without losing your place.
qb_scoring_even_noop: Add scorable questions before splitting weights.
qb_scoring_even_success: Split weights evenly across scorable questions.
qb_scoring_hint_text: Assign weights so priority questions total about 100%. Items left at 0 are informational only and do not affect scores or analytics.
qb_scoring_likert_note: Likert questions automatically share 100% of the score in analytics.
qb_scoring_manual_total_ok: Manual weights currently add up to %s%%.
qb_scoring_manual_total_warning: Manual weights currently add up to %s%%.
qb_scoring_missing_warning: Dashboards will show “Not scored” unless at least one question has weight.
qb_scoring_no_scorable: Add single-choice or weighted questions to enable scoring.
qb_scoring_non_single_choice_note: While a questionnaire contains single-choice questions, other question types are excluded from scoring.
qb_scoring_nonlikert_note: While a questionnaire contains Likert questions, other question types are excluded from scoring.
qb_scoring_normalize_noop: Add weights to questions before normalizing.
qb_scoring_single_choice_note: Single-choice questions automatically share 100% of the score in analytics.
qb_start_create_hint: Begin from scratch with a fresh questionnaire layout.
qb_start_edit_hint: Choose a questionnaire to load it into the builder for updates.
qb_start_import_hint: Upload a questionnaire XML file or download our template to mirror other survey tools.
qb_weight_hint: Only weighted questions contribute to scoring and analytics. Items left at 0 are excluded from scores and charts.
question: ጥያቄ
questionnaire_drilldown_hint: የተመረጠውን መጠይቅ እያንዳንዱን ምላሽ ለማየት ይምረጡ።
questionnaire_heatmap_alt: የመጠይቅ አማካይ ውጤቶችን በቀለም የሚያሳዩ የአግድም መስመር ገጽታ
questionnaire_heatmap_empty: ውጤቶች ሲገቡ የመጠይቅ አፈጻጸም እዚህ ይታያል።
required_questions_missing: እባክዎን ሁሉንም አስፈላጊ ጥያቄዎች ከመላክዎ በፊት ይሙሉ።
restore_backup_failed: The restore command failed. Review the log for details.
restore_backup_invalid: Select a backup before attempting a restore.
restore_backup_missing: The selected backup metadata could not be found on the server.
restore_database_hint: Also restore the database from the selected backup.
review_column_missing_notice: The review workflow setting could not be saved because the database is missing the required column. Please run the latest upgrade script and try again.
review_disabled_notice: የተቆጣጣሪ ግምገማዎች በአሁኑ ጊዜ በቅንብሮች ውስጥ ተዘግተዋል።
review_queue_summary: Review submissions that need your feedback.
review_settings_hint: የተቆጣጣሪ ግምገማ ሥርዓቱን ለሙሉ ስርዓት ለመክፈት ወይም ለመዝጋት ይችላሉ።
section_breakdown_hint: Each radar shows how your latest submission performed across questionnaire sections.
sectional_scores_aggregated_hint: ክፍል አማካይ ውጤቶችን ለተመረጡ ተጠቃሚዎች ያሳያል።
sectional_scores_by_user_hint: ክፍል ውጤቶችን ለእያንዳንዱ ተመረጠ ተጠቃሚ ይነጻጸር።
select_backup_hint: Choose a snapshot to restore or download.
select_questionnaire_to_view_sections: Select a questionnaire to view its sections
settings_missing_columns_notice: Settings could not be saved because the configuration table is missing required columns.
sign_in_subheading: Use your credentials to continue to your personalized workspace.
snapshot_hint: Review pending or disabled accounts frequently to maintain workforce readiness.
submission_failed: ምላሽዎን መቀመጥ አልተቻለም። እባክዎን ደግሞ ይሞክሩ።
submission_not_found: The requested submission could not be found.
submit_assessment_summary: Complete or update your latest assessment.
system_information_intro: Monitor release status, backups, and key usage metrics from a single view.
system_navigation_summary: Configure authentication, exports, and platform upgrades.
system_recovery_hint: Follow the recovery guide to restore the latest working backup when an upgrade fails.
team_navigation_summary: Support your team with reviews and approvals.
unexpected_error_notice: An unexpected error occurred while loading the settings.
upgrade_check_failed: የቅርብ ልቀትን ለማረጋገጥ GitHub ማድረስ አልተቻለም። እባክዎን በኋላ ይሞክሩ።
upgrade_check_no_release: No GitHub releases were found for the configured repository.
upgrade_command_failed: The upgrade command returned a non-zero exit code. Review the log for details.
upgrade_command_success: Upgrade command completed successfully. Review the logs for details.
upgrade_complete: Upgrade installed successfully. Database patches have been applied.
upgrade_failed: The upgrade could not be completed. Review the logs and database permissions, then try again.
upgrade_hint: Ensure a recent backup has been downloaded before applying upgrades.
upgrade_hint_script: The upgrade script automatically creates backups before applying changes. Download manual backups whenever you need an extra copy.
upgrade_latest: You are already on the latest version.
upgrade_log_hint: Results from the most recent upgrade or restore command.
upgrade_progress_default: Applying update. This may take a few moments...
upgrade_progress_install: Installing update. Please keep this page open until the process completes.
upgrade_repo_cleared: Release source cleared. The default repository will be used.
upgrade_repo_hint: Specify the GitHub repository slug or a full HTTPS Git URL used to check for releases (for example, https://github.com/khoppenworth/HRassessv300).
upgrade_repo_invalid: Enter a valid GitHub owner/repository slug.
upgrade_repo_save_failed: Unable to save the upgrade source. Please try again.
user_already_processed: This account has already been processed.
user_create_failed: ተጠቃሚውን ማቋቋም አልተቻለም። እባክዎን እንደገና ይሞክሩ።

username_exists: A user with that username already exists.
welcome_msg: የራስዎን ግምገማ ይጀምሩና የአፈጻጸም ታሪክዎን ይከታተሉ
work_function_archive_confirm: Archive this work function? Existing assignments will be removed.
work_function_catalog_empty: No work functions are currently available.
work_function_catalog_error: Unable to update work functions. Please try again.
work_function_catalog_hint: Add, rename, or archive work functions to control questionnaire availability.
work_function_defaults_card_hint: Staff in this work function receive the selected questionnaires by default.
work_function_defaults_hint: Choose the questionnaires that should be provided automatically to staff members based on their work function or cadre.
work_function_defaults_invalid_payload: The work function selections could not be processed. Please try again.
work_function_defaults_none: No work functions are available yet. Assign work functions to staff members to provide questionnaires.
work_function_defaults_save_failed: Unable to save work function defaults. Please try again.
work_function_defaults_summary: Set default work function options for new assessments.
work_function_empty: Assign questionnaires to teams to see benchmarks populate here.
work_function_heatmap_alt: Horizontal bar chart comparing work function averages using heatmap colours.
work_function_heatmap_empty: Performance by work function will display after a few submissions are recorded.
